elements.description: Briyah Institute is a Florida-based Benefit Corporation with a global reach. We focus on leadership development, innovation journeys and strategic advisory for companies. We help individuals and organizations apply systems thinking to strategize, problem solve and innovate. We partner with other organizations to address 21st-century socioeconomic and environmental challenges and co-create an impact economy, that which pursues financial returns alongside positive impact for people and planet.
elements.label: Briyah Institute Corp.

elements.description: Stefan Wolff is Principal of Mangrove Contracting, a Florida-based construction management firm focused on the built environment of tomorrow. Born and raised in South Florida, Stefan loves spending time with his family in nature -- and is driven to make sure that it is there to enjoy for generations to come.
elements.label: Stefan Wolff, LEED AP BD+C

elements.description:
Kim Armor is a business builder, CFO, and strategic partner.  She is passionate about using her skills and experience to make a difference in the world, and is the Head of Business Development at oneshot.earth, which is accelerating capital to project developers.
Kim held executive leadership positions at Comcast, ESPN, Disney, and KPMG. She is a graduate of NYU Stern School of Business, completed Terra.do's Climate Farm School program and a member of The Nature Conservancy Miami Council.  She is moving from NYC to Coconut Grove in 2024 and is looking forward to engaging with the Miami climate community on project execution.
elements.label: Kim Armor
